sentences.en: We welcome this development and we look forward to early ratification of the treaty by China.
sentences.cn: 我们欢迎这一进展并期望中国早日批准本条约。

sentences.en: The treaty is subject to ratification.
sentences.cn: 本条约须经批准方可生效。

sentences.en: What is required is formal ratification at the UN Security Council.
sentences.cn: 所需要的是联合国安理会的正式批准。
